You may purchase this quest from the Token Shop.
You must complete the previous quest to unlock this one.
The king has tasked you with the delivery of an important message to a land across the great waters. Use your renowned tracking skills to avoid the monsters along the way!

Years have gone by in the flash of an eye. The glory days are long behind you. How exactly did your adventure end? What lay beyond the brink? It seems you've grown a bit fuzzy on the details. Regardless, there are more pressing matters to attend to - your quiet farm life has been interrupted by a strange new evil!

Despite your best efforts, the kingdom has fallen. Shadows run rampant across the lands. Some say you never really made it out of that dungeon. But you and I both know that's not true, right? You're awake now, in a strange place. Let the real adventure begin.

It's becoming more difficult to distinguish between reality and fiction. Know this, my friend: the machine is real. It powers our world. Not many have seen behind the curtain... many don't want to. They are afraid to learn what lies below.

You're still here, are you? Desperate for the truth? Well, don't say I didn't warn you. When you get to the very end, and see what lies on the other side, just remember that we were trying to protect you. If you have any sense, you'll turn back now.
Infinite variations. One destination. Delay the inevitable annihilation of your soul for as long as you can.
Put your mettle to the test with a new adventure every day! Can you survive these wartorn lands?
Play more stages to reveal this stage.
Stand at the edge of tomorrow.
